property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your creatures gets +4000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, put one of your opponent's shields into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Sympathy: Face Up cards in your shields (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your face up cards in your shields. It can't cost 0 or less.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, until the start of your next turn, this creature can't be destroyed. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may use any number of face up cards stacked on one of your shields for no cost.

Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. {SUPER}Put all your opponent's creatures that have power 3000 or less into their mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SABAKI Z} (When a Judgment Emblem is added to your hand from your shields, you may discard that card. If you do, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. From among them, add all Metallica, Dragons and spells into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on one of your shields face up instead. (The stack is still considered one shield.)
